item.title: Anonymous: Comment 1

item.description: I am using "tor-browser-1.3.16_en-US" browser bundle.Whenever I start "C:\WINDOWS\system32\alg.exe" tries to establish a FTP connection to " 92.243.8.139" from port 1700 to port 21.Just want to know what for?

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 2

item.description: Any chance you can link to where to download these puppies when you do these blog posts... would just save a few clicks, thanks.

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 3
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
We're using the linux torbrowser bundle as a beta for updates to the windows bundle. If the linux package works with respect to firefox and plugins, we'll update the windows bundle to the same set of software.
curt
jordan flight

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 4
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description: I am wiondering there are a lot of requests from all around the world asking why the startup service stops at "Establishing an encypted directory connection" Step. I didn't found any clear and resonablen answer. i am one of them. my time setting is correct. it's not about time settings.

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 5
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
If I can use Tor, anyone can use Tor - I'm nearly 66 and though it's taken quite a bit of tinkering, I've finally managed to get it to work perfectly! I needed to tweak my own system and my Firefox, but once I got rid of No Script, things improved hugely! (I've got a new Mac Mini.)

I haven't got enough bandwidth or IT knowledge to help out much, but I'd like to thank all the kind people (here and elsewhere) who generously contribute time and expertise for the public good!

item.title: Anonymous: Comment 6
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous
item.description:
I tried tbb 1.1.3 for linux and there`s something which confuses me: In the torbutton settings, as well as in firefox settings, http-proxy and the fields below are blank. The only setting there is SOCKS 127.0.0.1 port 9050.

Why is that? There used to be localhost port 8118 for http before, please answer because i need this thing working, really

item.description: Can I just install on top of my old TBB folder? I want to keep addons and settings as well as my bookmarks.
